thread.title: Colts Punter Pat McAfee Rips The NFL And NFL Network Over Antonio Brown ‘Pouting’ Story
thread.title_full: Colts Punter Pat McAfee Rips The NFL And NFL Network Over Antonio Brown ‘Pouting’ Story

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Colts Punter Pat McAfee Rips The NFL And NFL Network Over Antonio Brown ‘Pouting’ Story
text:
Early this morning, NFL Network reporter Aditi Kinkhabwala claimed she had seen Pittsburgh Steelers star wide receiver pouting after his teammate De’Angelo Williams scored a touchdown.
We checked the video and it doesn’t look like Brown was pouting at all. 
So not only was Antonio Brown not open in the back of the end zone but he appears to celebrate DeAngelo Williams TD, no "pouting" pic.twitter.com/RQVBUmcD5J 
— gifdsports (@gifdsports) January 24, 2017 

Colts punter had an issue with the league’s reporting on the matter and fired off this tweet. 
NFL Network..owned/operated by the NFL..reported @AntonioBrown was pouting after 1st td..so, lying 2 make superstars look bad is good 4 biz? pic.twitter.com/wU4MxMd3Ng 
— Pat McAfee (@PatMcAfeeShow) January 24, 2017 
@dlolleyor @AntonioBrown the refs as well
— Pat McAfee (@PatMcAfeeShow) January 24, 2017 

Gotta love Pat, always keeping it real.
